Your credit card will be charged $<%immediate_price%> today and each year you continue your membership, once you submit your order below. You may cancel your membership and stop the annual billing by contacting us at any time. Cancellations taking place after the first month of membership will be eligible for a pro-rated refund. All cancellations taking place during the first month of membership are not eligible for a refund.
